laboratory_examinations.findings: Pre-splenectomy: 2.09 mmol/L; Post-splenectomy: 7.27 mmol/L; 3 months post-splenectomy: 2.31 mmol/L; 1 year post-splenectomy: 7.27 mmol/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: TG increased markedly from 2.09 mmol/L pre-splenectomy to 7.27 mmol/L post-splenectomy, then decreased to 2.31 mmol/L 3 months after treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Pre-splenectomy: 2.32 mmol/L; Post-splenectomy: 5.17 mmol/L; 3 months post-splenectomy: 6.56 mmol/L; 1 year post-splenectomy: 5.17 mmol/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: TC increased from 2.32 mmol/L pre-splenectomy to 5.17 mmol/L post-splenectomy, then rose further to 6.56 mmol/L after 3 months on treatment.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Pre-splenectomy: 0.54 mmol/L; Post-splenectomy: 0.59 mmol/L; 3 months post-splenectomy: 0.85 mmol/L; 1 year post-splenectomy: 0.49 mmol/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: HDL-C fluctuated, initially increasing after splenectomy then decreasing slightly at 1 year.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Post-splenectomy: increased b-VLDL; VLDL-C/plasma TG ratio: 0.21.
